CMBB5.name: New Gas/LPG Combi Boiler with radiators, with storage

ASHP1.name: Air-source heat pump, high performance SPFH4: 3.0)
ASHP1.description: Air-source heat pump with a performance on the upper end of those recorded in the Energy Saving Trust 2013 TheHeatIsOn trial (2 out of 15), achievable only with good system design and use.
ASHP1.notes: A heat pump requires careful design, installation and comissioning to ensure efficient operation. Works best with lower temperatures for space heating - so with underfloor heating or oversized radiators designed for lower flow and return temperatures.

ASHP2.name: Air-source heat pump, average performance SPFH4: 2.45)
ASHP2.description: Average Air-source heat pump performance recorded in the Energy Saving Trust 2013 TheHeatIsOn trial
ASHP2.notes: A heat pump requires careful design, installation and comissioning to ensure efficient operation. Works best with lower temperatures for space heating - so with underfloor heating or oversized radiators designed for lower flow and return temperatures.
